name: Saravanakumar Arunachalam

profileSummary.title: Professional Summary
profileSummary.content: Software engineering professional with over 14 years of experience specializing in cloud-native, microservice, and event-driven architectures. Proficient in Java, Go, Python, Spring, Kubernetes, and AWS, with expertise in developing scalable, secure, and high-performance solutions. Strong background in DevOps, CI/CD, and infrastructure automation using Terraform and Helm. Passionate about driving innovation and solving complex challenges in high-volume, high-velocity data systems. Versatile and results-driven Software and Platform Engineer with deep experience designing, developing, and integrating scalable, cloud-native systems. Proficient in modern cloud-native technologies including Knative, Istio, cert-manager, and serverless platforms. Experienced in implementing SRE best practices, including infrastructure automation, CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and proactive incident response.
